about_the_game:
An item pack to help your avatar ninja get stronger!

Content includes:
• Moonlight Scroll x10
• Ninjutsu x10
- Rasengan (Attack Type)
- Fire Style: Fire Ball Jutsu (Ranged Type)
- Sand Shield (Defense Type)
- Cellular Extraction Jutsu (Heal Type)
- Lightning Blade (Attack Type)
- Sharingan (Attack Type)
- Chidori: One Thousand Birds (Ranged Type)
- Super Beast Scroll (Lion) (Ranged Type)
- Spiky Human Boulder (Defense Type)
- Byakugan (Heal Type)

Moonlight Scrolls can be used to obtain different customization items for your avatar, including costumes, weapons, and Ninja Tools! As with other games in the series, scrolls can be unsealed by appraising them at the Ninja Tools Shop.

*Moonlight Scroll x10 obtained directly from the Ninja Tools Shop, not from the Gift Box.
*When appraising these scrolls, you can receive items equal in rarity to the Esoteric Scrolls you get in the game.
*The Moonlight Scrolls in this pack are consumable items. They will be used via the in-game Appraisal feature.
detailed_description:
An item pack to help your avatar ninja get stronger!

Content includes:
• Moonlight Scroll x10
• Ninjutsu x10
- Rasengan (Attack Type)
- Fire Style: Fire Ball Jutsu (Ranged Type)
- Sand Shield (Defense Type)
- Cellular Extraction Jutsu (Heal Type)
- Lightning Blade (Attack Type)
- Sharingan (Attack Type)
- Chidori: One Thousand Birds (Ranged Type)
- Super Beast Scroll (Lion) (Ranged Type)
- Spiky Human Boulder (Defense Type)
- Byakugan (Heal Type)

Moonlight Scrolls can be used to obtain different customization items for your avatar, including costumes, weapons, and Ninja Tools! As with other games in the series, scrolls can be unsealed by appraising them at the Ninja Tools Shop.

*Moonlight Scroll x10 obtained directly from the Ninja Tools Shop, not from the Gift Box.
*When appraising these scrolls, you can receive items equal in rarity to the Esoteric Scrolls you get in the game.
*The Moonlight Scrolls in this pack are consumable items. They will be used via the in-game Appraisal feature.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8350K
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 640
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 sound device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K @ 3.30GHz / AMD FX-6300 Six-Core
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 270X / R7 265 2 GB / Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 2 GB
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 sound device
